name: 🤥  Cpt Shaliber
description: Could sell sand in the desert, and you'd still thank him.

name: 🧔🏽‍♂️  Redbeard
description: Once tried to wrestle a shark... and won. The shark was never the same.

name: ⚔️  Lily "The Blade"
description: Swings first, asks questions never.

name: 👁️  One-Eyed Pete
description: Keeps an eye out for trouble... well, half an eye.

name: 🤑  Blackjack
description: He'd steal your gold teeth while you're smiling.

name: 🏅  Scarlett the Swift
description: Would dive into a storm for her crew, but really hates getting wet.

name: 💥  Barnacle Bill
description: His motto: 'Act first, think later… or never.'

name: 🔮  Misty Morgan
description: Convinced the sea is watching her, so she watches back.

name: 🧮  Ironfist Ivan
description: Treats every fight like a game of chess... if chess pieces exploded.

name: 🥃  Grog "The Gutsy"
description: Afraid of nothing, except running out of rum.

name: 🏃‍♂️  Silent Sam
description: Runs so fast from danger that even the wind gets left behind.

name: 🃏  Lucky Lenny
description: Could make a sail out of socks and still win a race.

name: ⛈️  Stormy Weather
description: Swears she can predict the weather—just don't ask how accurate she is.

name: 🪙  Mara the Merciless
description: Her heart is as cold as the treasure she hoards.

name: 🧭  Navigator Ned
description: Knows the seas like the back of his hand, but occasionally mixes up left and right.

name: 🦁  Crimson Corsair
description: She'd fight to the death for her crew, but draws the line at washing dishes.

name: 👹  Madcap Max
description: Has a habit of charging into battle... even if it's just a bar brawl.

name: 🏗️  Tide Turner
description: Once turned a rowboat into a fortress with just a spoon and some rope.

name: 💣  Blunderbuss Betty
description: Thinks subtlety is overrated and her blunderbuss agrees.

name: 🌬️  Windy Wendy
description: Always checks the winds before setting sail, just in case they're plotting something.

name: 😈  Viko the Sicko
description: Rumored to enjoy battles a bit too much—probably why he's always grinning.

name: ⚡  Hiperion
description: Claims to be descended from the gods, but can't swim.

name: 📚  Quartermaster Pibo
description: Knows every trick in the book... because he wrote it.

name: 🐔  Doug Dodger
description: Master of avoiding danger, and of taking credit when it's over.

name: 🥭  Mango Loco
description: Takes orders from a talking mango. Don't ask.

name: 🦵  Kneejerk Mona
description: Jumps at every shadow, convinced they're all out to get him.
